metadata.Title: CVE-2019-17382 on Ubuntu 20.04 FIPS Certified (focal) - low.
metadata.Description: An issue was discovered in zabbix.php?action=dashboard.view&dashboardid=1 in Zabbix through 4.4. An attacker can bypass the login page and access the dashboard page, and then create a Dashboard, Report, Screen, or Map without any Username/Password (i.e., anonymously). All created elements (Dashboard/Report/Screen/Map) are accessible by other users and by an admin.

notes.Note: ebarretto> Disputed by upstream and closed as not a security bug. This issue can be avoided by disabling guest account.

criterions.comment: zabbix package in focal is affected and needs fixing.
